Robert Lynch

Web/Software Developer

Summary

I'm a self-taught programmer residing in lake city, FL. Since the days of Organ Trail I have been fascinated with Software Development. When I wrote my first program "Hello World!" it only peaked my interest even further. I'm currently working as a freelance developer as I hone in on my knowledge and understanding of Object oriented programming. And working towards establishing my career on a team of like minded developers.
